sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Malay: Perang menangis untuk keadilan adalah lebih - banyak kepada kekejian pihak berkuasa.
backtrans: The war cried for justice is much more to the abomination of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Malay: Keputusan rejim itu mengagumi agenda asas.
backtrans: The regime's decision admired the basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Malay: Masyarakat itu cemas mengenai lulus pembaharuan yang sangat diperlukan.
backtrans: The community is anxious about passing the indispensable renewal.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Malay: The Think Tank menerbitkan sebuah kertas yang menggariskan permintaan maaf mereka terhadap hukuman mati.
backtrans: The Think Tank published a paper that outlined their apologies against the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Aught abandoned the validity of petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Malay: Presiden menasihati menteri-menterinya untuk menggabungkan sebagai sokongan pembangkang utama untuk pelan ekonominya akan menjadi gesper.
backtrans: The President advised his ministers to incorporate as the support of the main opposition for his economic plan would be buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Malay: Pengundi telah mengejek untuk melihat rang undang-undang itu berlalu.
backtrans: The voters have mocked to see the bill passing.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
backtrans: Narasi Discursive Lawyers move the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Malay: Blok EU menentang pengenaan langkah-langkah anti-lambakan.
backtrans: The EU block opposes the imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Malay: Eulogy fulsome disampaikan oleh peguam yang licik.
backtrans: Eulogy Fulsome was delivered by a cunning lawyer.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Malay: Agensi Gig-Ekonomi memutuskan untuk menghiasi bayaran balik!
backtrans: Gig-economic agency decides to decorate the refund!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Malay: Ahli-ahli Pergerakan Revolusi Anti-Teokratik menggulingkan rakan-rakan yang berkuasa!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the powerful friends!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Malay: Para pengkhianat yang mengecewakan memutuskan untuk bertarung dengan penjajah.
backtrans: The disappointing traitors decided to fight with the colonialists.
